original: intros a b c nZa nZb nZppab H1 H2 p q Cpxa Cpxb. apply eqP_trans with (mults multA (divTerm c (ppc a b nZppab) nZppab) (spolyf (pX a p) (pX b q) Cpxa Cpxb)). - apply eqP_sym. apply eqTerm_spolyf_red2; auto. - apply eqP_trans with (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (mults multA (divTerm c a nZa) (pX a p)) (mults multA (divTerm c b nZb) (pX b q))). + apply eqP_sym. apply eqTerm_spolyf_red3; auto. + apply H.
